summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for Shocker Holdings LLC, detailing account activity for July 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and account balances, indicating a significant outgoing wire transfer of $20,000.

persons.name: Philip Fintchrc
persons.context: Philip Fintchrc is identified as the relationship manager for the business account at Fifth Third Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Wire Transfer
events.description: An outgoing wire transfer of $20,000 was made from the account.

events.title: Deposit
events.description: A deposit of $10,000 was made into the account.

keyFacts: The statement covers the period from July 1, 2014, to July 31, 2014.
The beginning balance on July 1, 2014, was $19,558.80.
The ending balance on July 31, 2014, was $9,558.30.
There was a significant outgoing wire transfer of $20,000 on July 10, 2014.
The account maintained a total monthly average balance of $19,558.10.
